review:
My entire family was declared Covid positive. The way Doctor Aggarwal treated us is highly commendable. He was very quick on the line of treatment.
We have been consulting him for other ailments and general consultancy.  ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** ********* Very humble and listens patiently.
